thread.title: Volkswagen accessorizes Atlas with new Weekend Edition - Roadshow
thread.title_full: Volkswagen accessorizes Atlas with new Weekend Edition - Roadshow

title: Volkswagen accessorizes Atlas with new Weekend Edition - Roadshow
text:
1 of 13 Volkswagen accessorizes Atlas with new Weekend Edition 
This is one Atlas you won't be able to buy in dealerships -- it's just a concept for the Chicago Auto Show. Photo by: Volkswagen 
That said, you can pick up most of these accessories at the VW dealership, so you can sort of get one? Photo by: Volkswagen 
The main exterior addition is the cargo box atop the vehicle, which expands to hold nearly 18 cubic feet of cargo. Photo by: Volkswagen 
The exterior also features splashguards and special 18-inch wheels. Photo by: Volkswagen 
Inside, there's a universal tablet mount, which is a better option than throwing a bunch of money at an expensive in-car entertainment add-on. Photo by: Volkswagen 
A cargo divider behind the second row makes an excellent pet divider. Photo by: Volkswagen 
Additional storage solutions allow you to keep round or small objects in one place. Photo by: Volkswagen 
See? Great for pets, even dogs this large. Photo by: Volkswagen 
Sadly, I don't think these tires will be available, but there's nothing stopping you from making a trip to your local tire shop. Photo by: Volkswagen 
Keep on scrollin' to check out more photos of VW's latest concept. Photo by: Volkswagen
